question: How many Canadians have been awarded the Victoria Cross?
main_question: How many Canadians have been awarded the Victoria Cross?
explanatory_sentence: The Victoria Cross (V.C.) is the highest honour available to Canadians and is awarded for the most conspicuous bravery, a daring or pre-eminent act of valour or self-sacrifice, or extreme devotion to duty in the presence of the enemy. The V.C. has been awarded to 96 Canadians since 1854.
